consent.title: Research Participation Consent
consent.description: You are invited to participate in a research study conducted by Dubai Health in collaboration with our research partner, Virufy.Before you decide, please carefully review the official study documents. Your participation is voluntary.
consent.dubaiHealthTitle: Dubai Health - Participant Information & Consent Form:
consent.dubaiHealthDesc: Explains the study's purpose, procedures, risks, and benefits.
consent.virufyDesc: As our research partner, Virufy helps analyze the data. This document explains how Virufy handles your data.
consent.readFull: Click to read the full document
consent.confirmationDesc: By checking the boxes below, you confirm you have reviewed the information and agree to participate.
consent.checkbox1: I certify that I am 18 years of age or older.
consent.checkbox2: I have read and understood the Dubai Health Participant Information & Consent Form.
consent.checkbox3: I acknowledge that my anonymized data will be shared with Virufy for analysis and that I have reviewed their Privacy Policy.
consent.checkbox4: I explicitly consent to the collection and processing of my health information and recordings (cough, breathing, speech).

recordSpeech.title: Record Your Speech
recordSpeech.instruction1: Find a quiet place at least 6 meters away from others.
recordSpeech.instruction2: Hold the bottom of your device 1–2 feet (30–60 cm) from your mouth.
recordSpeech.instruction3: Press the record button. Keep saying "aaaah" for at least 5 seconds. Then press stop.
recordSpeech.mouthDistanceAlt: Hold device at mouth distance illustration

recordBreath.title: Record your breath
recordBreath.instruction1: Find a quiet place at least 20 ft (6m) away from others. If you are feeling ill, please sit down.
recordBreath.instruction2: Hold the bottom of your device 1-2 ft (30-60 cm) away from your mouth.
recordBreath.instruction3: Tap record. Breathe deeply and loudly into the phone 3 times. Then tap stop.
recordBreath.mouthDistanceAlt: Hold device at mouth distance illustration

recordCough.title: Record your cough
recordCough.instruction1: Find a quiet place at least 20 ft (6m) away from others. If you are feeling ill, please sit down.
recordCough.instruction2: Hold the bottom of your device 1-2 ft (30-60 cm) away from your mouth. Try not to cough too forcefully.
recordCough.instruction3: Tap record, cough 3 times with a deep breath between each cough. Then tap stop.
recordCough.mouthDistanceAlt: Hold device at mouth distance illustration
